name: Think Different
description: Think Different is a durable plant with strong sativa effects that leave consumers feeling dreamy and relaxed. A colorful and well-rounded strain from Dutch Passion, Think Different provides a balance of hybrid genetics concocted by crossing AK-420 with the automatic-flowering capabilities of an undefined ruderalis strain. The sweet and spicy aroma will entice you, while the fast-acting, uplifting high will give a boost to your creativity and help you think outside the box.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Energetic, Creative, Focused, Eye Pressure, Stress, Pain, Depression, Fatigue, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dry Mouth
